final_production_data.ticker: US STOCKS RISE ON FEDERAL RESERVE HOPES
final_production_data.main_heading: US Stocks Rise on Federal Reserve Rate-Cut Hopes
headlines: Stocks advanced on Wednesday as expectations for an interest-rate cut at the Federal Reserve's next meeting helped fuel gains before the Thanksgiving break
Rate-cut could boost economic growth and corporate profits
Stay tuned for more updates on the Federal Reserve's decision
final_production_data.tts_script: US stocks advanced on Wednesday as expectations for an interest-rate cut at the Federal Reserve's next meeting helped fuel gains before the Thanksgiving break.

original_raw_news.original_title: US Stocks Rise as Rate-Cut Hopes Drive Gains Before Thanksgiving
original_raw_news.original_summary: US stocks advanced on Wednesday as expectations for an interest-rate cut at the Federal Reserve’s next meeting helped fuel gains before the Thanksgiving break.
